artist: Artist: Pat Hui; Author: Nalan Singde
creditline: Gift of funds from Virginia Kremen in memory of Dr. Arnold Kremen
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two images with Chinese text on small left image and English translation at right; slightly diagonal bands of color with spots and white--purple, red, yellow, green, blue
dimension:

21 1/2 x 39 7/16 in. (54.61 x 100.17 cm) (mount)
title: Who remembers the west wind, alone in the cold, from a set of 24 poems
